name: Githubhacks
tagline: This is a Bangalore Tech Talks GitHub Hacks Demo Repository.
body:
### Welcome to Bangalore Tech Talks.
Lets get together to learn, share, decode, challenge, network, presenting, etc. Its a forum for great hackers / techies / Geeks to come and talk your favourite subject. Its forum for aspirants to get free access to expertise, learn from their mistakes, understanding great coding experiences, etc. End of each meetup we want to make sure that you learned something, you cherished to be part of this meetup. You are a lot more better individual after these sessions. And last but not the least, fun way of learning.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
